summary: A group of friends are tasked with finding the daughter of a village head who believes them to have helped her elope.
cast: Allu Arjun|Sheela Kaur|Poonam Bajwa|Prakash Raj|Jayasudha|Suneel|Srinivasa Reddy|Chitram Sreenivas|Kalpana|Jeeva|Pruthvi|Dhanraj|Ali|Jayaprakash Reddy|Rajitha|Ragini|Delhi Rajeshwari|Veerendra Chauhan|Sapthagiri|Chitram Seenu|Subbaraju
title: Parugu
